TextView.android:text: Normal work activities may have been offset (e.g., deprioritized, delayed, or not completed) do to an outbreak investigation. These 'opportunity costs' are indirect effects of the outbreak, and while difficult to monetize, are important factors to include. This tab provides for a qualitative assessment of any work activities/projects that were offset by the outbreak investigation.
